GV01rv_08_u:1535: RV_08.053.05.2{23} ā śantama śantamābhirabhiṣṭibhirā svāpe svāpibhiḥ RV_08.053.06.1{23} ājituraṃ satpatiṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ kṛdhi prajāsvābhagam RV_08.053.06.2{23} pra sū tirā śacībhirye ta ukthinaḥ kratuṃ punata ānuṣak

GV01rv_08_u:1538: RV_08.054.01.1{24} etat ta indra vīryaṃ gīrbhirgṛṇanti kāravaḥ

GV01rv_08_u:1553: RV_08.055.02.1{26} śataṃ śvetāsa ukṣaṇo divi tāro na rocante

GV01rv_08_u:1566: RV_08.056.05.2{27} agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā bṛhat sūro arocata divi sūryo arocata
GV01rv_08_u:1567: RV_08.057.01.1{28} yuvaṃ devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣaṃ yajatrā RV_08.057.01.2{28} āgachataṃ nāsatyā śacībhiridaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ pibāthaḥ
GV01rv_08_u:1568: RV_08.057.02.1{28} yuvāṃ devāstraya ekādaśāsaḥ satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe

GV01rv_08_u:1573: RV_08.057.04.1{28} ayaṃ vāṃ bhāgo nihito yajatremā giro nāsatyopa yātam RV_08.057.04.2{28} pibataṃ somaṃ madhumantamasme pra dāśvāṃsamavataṃ śacībhiḥ
GV01rv_08_u:1574: RV_08.058.01.1{29} yam ṛtvijo bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetaso yajñamimaṃ

GV01rv_08_u:1578: RV_08.058.02.2{29} ekaivoṣāḥ sarvamidaṃ vi bhātyekaṃ vā idaṃvi babhūva sarvam RV_08.058.03.1{29} jyotiṣmantaṃ ketumantaṃ tricakraṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ suṣadaṃ
GV01rv_08_u:1580: RV_08.058.03.2{29} citrāmaghā yasya yoge 'dhijajñe taṃ vāṃ huveati riktaṃ pibadhyai

GV01rv_08_u:1584: RV_08.059.03.2{30} tābhirdāśvāṃsamavataṃ śubhas patī yo vāmadabdho abhi

GV01rv_08_u:1595: RV_08.060.01.1{32} agna ā yāhyagnibhirhotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe RV_08.060.01.2{32} ā tvāmanaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭhaṃ barhirāsade

GV01rv_08_u:1630: RV_08.061.03.2{36} vidmā hi tvā harivaḥ pṛtsu sāsahimadhṛṣṭaṃ cid dadhṛṣvaṇim RV_08.061.04.1{36} aprāmisatya maghavan tathedasadindra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ

GV01rv_08_u:1632: RV_08.061.06.1{37} pauro aśvasya purukṛd gavāmasyutso deva hiraṇyayaḥ

GV01rv_08_u:1635: RV_08.061.07.2{37} ud vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣṭaya udindrāśvamiṣṭaye RV_08.061.08.1{37} tvaṃ purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca yūthā dānāya maṃhase RV_08.061.08.2{37} ā purandaraṃ cakṛma vipravacasa indraṃ gāyanto 'vase
GV01rv_08_u:1636: RV_08.061.09.1{37} avipro vā yadavidhad vipro vendra te vacaḥ
GV01rv_08_u:1637: RV_08.061.09.2{37} sa pra mamandattvāyā śatakrato prācāmanyo ahaṃsana
GV01rv_08_u:1638: RV_08.061.10.1{37} ugrabāhurmrakṣakṛtvā purandaro yadi me śṛṇavad dhavam
GV01rv_08_u:1639: RV_08.061.10.2{37} vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomairindraṃ havāmahe RV_08.061.11.1{38} na pāpāso manāmahe nārāyāso na jaḷhavaḥ

GV01rv_08_u:1641: RV_08.061.12.1{38} ugraṃ yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim ṛṇakātimadābhyam RV_08.061.12.2{38} vedā bhṛmaṃ cit sanitā rathītamo vājinaṃ yamidū naśat RV_08.061.13.1{38} yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi
GV01rv_08_u:1642: RV_08.061.13.2{38} maghavañchagdhitava tan na ūtibhirvi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi RV_08.061.14.1{38} tvaṃ hi rādhaspate rādhaso mahaḥ kṣayasyāsi vidhataḥ
GV01rv_08_u:1643: RV_08.061.14.2{38} taṃ tvā vayaṃ maghavannindra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto

GV01rv_08_u:1648: RV_08.061.16.1{39} tvaṃ naḥ paścādadharāduttarāt pura indra ni pāhi viśvataḥ RV_08.061.16.2{39} āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyaṃ bhayamāre hetīradevīḥ
GV01rv_08_u:1649: RV_08.061.17.1{39} adyādyā śvaḥ-śva indra trāsva pare ca naḥ RV_08.061.17.2{39} viśvā ca nojaritṝn satpate ahā divā naktaṃ ca rakṣiṣaḥ
GV01rv_08_u:1650: RV_08.061.18.1{39} prabhaṅgī śūro maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ sammiṣlo viryāya kam
GV01rv_08_u:1651: RV_08.061.18.2{39} ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato ni yā vajraṃ mimikṣatuḥ

GV01rv_08_u:1778: RV_08.068.{01}1 . ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaye sumnāya vartayāmasi |
GV01rv_08_u:1779: RV_08.068.{01}2 . tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indra śaviṣṭha satpate ||
GV01rv_08_u:1780: RV_08.068.{02}1 . tuviśuṣma tuvikrato śacīvo viśvayā mate |
GV01rv_08_u:1782: RV_08.068.{03}1 . yasya te mahinā mahaḥ pari jmāyantam īyatuḥ |

GV01rv_08_u:1785: RV_08.068.{04}2 . evaiś ca carṣaṇīnām ūtī huve rathānām ||
GV01rv_08_u:1786: RV_08.068.{05}1 . abhiṣṭaye sadāvṛdhaṃ svarmīḷheṣu yaṃ naraḥ |
GV01rv_08_u:1788: RV_08.068.{06}1 . paromātram ṛcīṣamam indram ugraṃ surādhasam |
GV01rv_08_u:1790: RV_08.068.{07}1 . taṃ-tam id rādhase maha indraṃ codāmi pītaye |
GV01rv_08_u:1791: RV_08.068.{07}2 . yaḥ pūrvyām anuṣṭutim īśe kṛṣṭīnāṃ nṛtuḥ ||
GV01rv_08_u:1792: RV_08.068.{08}1 . na yasya te śavasāna sakhyam ānaṃśa martyaḥ |

GV01rv_08_u:1797: RV_08.068.{10}2 . indra yathā cid āvitha vājeṣu purumāyyam ||

GV01rv_08_u:1800: RV_08.068.{12}1 . uru ṇas tanve tana uru kṣayāya nas kṛdhi |

GV01rv_08_u:1812: RV_08.068.{18}1 . aiṣu cetad vṛṣaṇvaty antar ṛjreṣv aruṣī |
GV01rv_08_u:1814: RV_08.068.{19}1 . na yuṣme vājabandhavo ninitsuś cana martyaḥ |
GV01rv_08_u:1816: RV_08.069.{01}1 . pra-pra vas triṣṭubham iṣam mandadvīrāyendave |

GV01rv_08_u:2385: RV_08.098.07.1{02} adhā hindra girvaṇa upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe RV_08.098.07.2{02} udevayanta udabhiḥ RV_08.098.08.1{02} vārṇa tvā yavyābhirvardhanti śūra brahmāṇi RV_08.098.08.2{02} vāvṛdhvāṃsaṃ cidadrivo dive-dive
GV01rv_08_u:2386: RV_08.098.09.1{02} yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayorau ratha uruyuge
GV01rv_08_u:2387: RV_08.098.09.2{02} indravāhā vacoyujā RV_08.098.10.1{02} tvaṃ na indrā bharanojo nṛmṇaṃ śatakrato vicarṣaṇe
GV01rv_08_u:2389: RV_08.098.11.1{02} tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā vaso tvaṃ mātā śatakrato babhūvitha

GV01rv_08_u:2393: RV_08.099.01.1{03} tvāmidā hyo naro 'pīpyan vajrin bhūrṇayaḥ RV_08.099.01.2{03} sa indra stomavāhasāmiha śrudhyupa svasaramā gahi

GV01rv_08_u:2396: RV_08.099.03.1{03} śrāyanta iva sūryaṃ viśvedindrasya bhakṣata RV_08.099.03.2{03} vasūni jāte janamāna ojasā prati bhāgaṃ na dīdhima RV_08.099.04.1{03} anarśarātiṃ vasudāmupa stuhi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
GV01rv_08_u:2397: RV_08.099.04.2{03} so asya kāmaṃ vidhato na roṣati mano dānāya codayan

GV01rv_08_u:2399: RV_08.099.06.1{03} anu te śuṣmaṃ turayantamīyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśuṃ na mātarā RV_08.099.06.2{03} viśvāste spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtraṃ yadindratūrvasi
GV01rv_08_u:2400: RV_08.099.07.1{03} ita ūtī vo ajaraṃ prahetāramaprahitam RV_08.099.07.2{03} āśuṃ jetāraṃ hetāraṃ rathītamamatūrtaṃ tugryāvṛdham RV_08.099.08.1{03} iṣkartāramaniṣkṛtaṃ sahaskṛtaṃ śatamūtiṃ śatakratum
GV01rv_08_u:2402: RV_08.100.01.1{04} ayaṃ ta emi tanvā purastād viśve devā abhi mā yanti paścāt RV_08.100.01.2{04} yadā mahyaṃ dīdharo bhāgamindrādin mayā kṛṇavo vīryāṇi
GV01rv_08_u:2403: RV_08.100.02.1{04} dadhāmi te madhuno bhakṣamagre hitaste bhāgaḥ suto astu somaḥ
GV01rv_08_u:2404: RV_08.100.02.2{04} asaśca tvaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ sakhā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇijaṅghanāva bhūri RV_08.100.03.1{04} pra su stomaṃ bharata vājayanta indrāya satyaṃ yadi satyamasti
GV01rv_08_u:2405: RV_08.100.03.2{04} nendro astīti nema u tva āha ka īṃ dadarśa
GV01rv_08_u:2407: RV_08.100.04.1{04} ayamasmi jaritaḥ paśya meha viśvā jātānyabhyasmi mahnā
GV01rv_08_u:2408: RV_08.100.04.2{04} ṛtasya mā pradiśo vardhayantyādardiro bhuvanā dardarīmi
GV01rv_08_u:2409: RV_08.100.05.1{04} ā yan mā venā aruhannṛtasyanekamāsīnaṃ haryatasya
GV01rv_08_u:2411: RV_08.100.05.2{04} manaścin me hṛda ā pratyavocadacikradañchiśumantaḥ sakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_08_u:2412: RV_08.100.06.1{04} viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā yā cakartha maghavannindra sunvate
GV01rv_08_u:2413: RV_08.100.06.2{04} pārāvataṃ yat purusambhṛtaṃ vasvapāvṛṇoḥ śarabhāya ṛṣibandhave
GV01rv_08_u:2414: RV_08.100.07.1{05} pra nūnaṃ dhāvatā pṛthaṃ neha yo vo avāvarīt RV_08.100.07.2{05} ni ṣīṃ vṛtrasya marmaṇi vajramindro apīpatat
GV01rv_08_u:2416: RV_08.100.08.2{05} divaṃ suparṇo gatvāya somaṃ vajriṇa ābharat

GV01rv_08_u:2420: RV_08.100.10.2{05} catasra ūrjaṃ duduhe payāṃsi kva svidasyāḥ paramaṃ jagāma RV_08.100.11.1{05} devīṃ vācamajanayanta devāstāṃ viśvarūpāḥ paśavo vadanti

GV01rv_08_u:2425: RV_08.101.01.1{06} ṛdhagitthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye RV_08.101.01.2{06} yo nūnaṃ mitrāvaruṇāvabhiṣṭaya ācakre havyadātaye RV_08.101.02.1{06} varṣiṣṭhakṣatrā urucakṣasā narā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā RV_08.101.02.2{06} tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ RV_08.101.03.1{06} pra yo vāṃ mitrāvaruṇājiro dūto adravat
GV01rv_08_u:2426: RV_08.101.03.2{06} ayaḥśīrṣā maderaghuḥ RV_08.101.04.1{06} na yaḥ sampṛche na punarhavītave nasaṃvādāya ramate

GV01rv_08_u:2429: RV_08.101.06.1{07} te hinvire aruṇaṃ jenyaṃ vasvekaṃ putraṃ tisṝṇām
GV01rv_08_u:2431: RV_08.101.07.1{07} ā me vacāṃsyudyatā dyumattamāni kartvā RV_08.101.07.2{07} ubhā yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye
GV01rv_08_u:2432: RV_08.101.08.1{07} rātiṃ yad vāmarakṣasaṃ havāmahe yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū
GV01rv_08_u:2433: RV_08.101.08.2{07} prācīṃ hotrāṃ pratirantāvitaṃ narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā
GV01rv_08_u:2434: RV_08.101.09.1{07} ā no yajñaṃ divispṛśaṃ vāyo yāhi sumanmabhiḥ
GV01rv_08_u:2435: RV_08.101.09.2{07} antaḥ pavitra upari śrīṇāno 'yaṃ śukro ayāmi te
GV01rv_08_u:2436: RV_08.101.10.1{07} vetyadhvaryuḥ pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye
GV01rv_08_u:2437: RV_08.101.10.2{07} adhā niyutva ubhayasya naḥ piba śuciṃ somaṃ gavāśiram RV_08.101.11.1{08} baṇ mahānasi sūrya baḷ āditya mahānasi
GV01rv_08_u:2438: RV_08.101.11.2{08} mahaste sato mahimā panasyate 'ddhā deva mahānasi RV_08.101.12.1{08} baṭ surya śravasā mahānasi satrā deva mahānasi
GV01rv_08_u:2440: RV_08.101.13.1{08} iyaṃ yā nīcyarkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā
GV01rv_08_u:2442: RV_08.101.14.1{08} prajā ha tisro atyāyamīyurnyanyā arkamabhito viviśre
GV01rv_08_u:2443: RV_08.101.14.2{08} bṛhad dha tasthau bhuvaneṣvantaḥ pavamāno harita ā viveśa RV_08.101.15.1{08} mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānāmamṛtasya nābhiḥ
GV01rv_08_u:2444: RV_08.101.15.2{08} pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gāmanāgāmaditiṃ vadhiṣṭa RV_08.101.16.1{08} vacovidaṃ vācamudīrayantīṃ viśvābhirdhībhirupatiṣṭhamānām
GV01rv_08_u:2445: RV_08.101.16.2{08} devīṃ devebhyaḥ paryeyuṣīṃ gāmā māvṛkta martyo

GV01rv_08_u:2467: RV_08.102.18.1{12} pracetasaṃ tvā kave 'gne dūtaṃ vareṇyam RV_08.102.18.2{12} havyavāhaṃ ni ṣedire
GV01rv_08_u:2468: RV_08.102.19.1{12} nahi me astyaghnyā na svadhitirvananvati RV_08.102.19.2{12} athaitādṛg bharāmi te

GV01rv_08_u:2479: RV_08.103.04.1{13} pra yaṃ rāye ninīṣasi marto yaste vaso dāśat RV_08.103.04.2{13} sa vīraṃ dhatte agna ukthaśaṃsinaṃ tmanā sahasrapoṣiṇam

GV01rv_08_u:2491: RV_08.103.12.1{15} mā no hṛṇītāmatithirvasuragniḥ purupraśasta eṣaḥ RV_08.103.12.2{15} yaḥ suhotā svadhvaraḥ

GV01rv_08_u:2494: RV_08.103.14.1{15} āgne yāhi marutsakhā rudrebhiḥ somapītaye RV_08.103.14.2{15} sobharyā upa suṣṭutiṃ mādayasva svarṇare
